blogs.title: What is TEDx?
blogs.body: TED is an annual event, which brings together the world’s leading thinkers and doers to share ideas that matter in any discipline. In this spirit of ‘Ideas Worth Spreading’, TED created TEDx: a programme of local, independently organised events, where live speakers and TED Talks videos combine to spark discussion amongst local communities all across the globe.
blogs.author: Ankit

blogs.title: Our Beliefs
blogs.body:
Written by Rahil

We believe passionately in the power of ideas to change attitudes, lives and, ultimately, the world.
blogs.author: Rahil
